message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.

I understand your concern, Bob. However, I think the product is worth more than $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, and that's my final offer.
I understand you're still hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $105. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I've already gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $105. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
